function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased risk of intimate partner violence due to stay-at-home policies during the sars-cov-2 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sufficient space in developing countries exacerbating the impact of stay-at-home policies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for spread of contagious diseases due to overcrowding in developing countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on anecdotal reporting for increase in intimate partner violence ipv during the pandemic","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to provide unbiased estimates of the rise in intimate partner violence ipv","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential seasonal increases in intimate partner violence ipv complicating the analysis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis based on incomplete or biased data may lead to inaccurate conclusions about disease propagation.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of causal relationships due to assumption validation through limited time frames and specific contexts.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate extrapolation of trends and causal relationships from a specific locality peru to a broader global context.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rise in calls to a helpline observed across all states.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lockdown measures limit face-to-face interviews for data collection on violence against women.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delays in the availability of data on intimate partner violence due to limited implementation of surveys.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in declaring workers as essential","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Nationwide stay-at-home orders and curfews","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of schools and continued stay-at-home orders","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of violence against women due to pandemic responses","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of women shelters during the pandemic severely limited services provided to callers","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in accessing microlevel data for calls during 2020","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced variance in the aggregated data may prevent identification of statistically significant effects","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nonpharmaceutical policies to combat covid-19 may increase the rate of incidence of calls to línea 100.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias due to seasonal effects in calls to the helpline.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low call counts in certain states may affect the reliability of the analysis.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher number of calls per 100,000 people per month indicate an increase in contagious disease propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating time-variant factors may not fully capture the evolving nature of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Robust standard errors and alternative cluster constructions may affect the accuracy of the findings","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased volume of calls to línea 100 after march 2020","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in effect by month post-march 2020","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Accelerated rise of calls to línea 100","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of microdata for 2020","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to identify gender and age of victims in state-level data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise in calls to helpline starting in april 2020","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of linear regression instead of poisson model","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sensitivity of findings to selected years","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on specific states in the analysis","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Close proximity of urban homes and population density may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to public services such as sanitation and clean water may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of health insurance coverage and limited access to healthcare facilities may result in undetected and uncontrolled contagious diseases within the population.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pattern of increased calls to domestic violence helpline since march 2020","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of data by state for analysis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise in calls to the helpline from all age groups, with larger effects in july","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in calls to helpline for violence against women in peru after stay-at-home policies started","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in domestic violence in peru where almost 60 percent of women experienced violence before the virus arrived","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unintended effects of stay at home orders leading to increased domestic violence globally","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of data from only 15 cities in the united states may not be representative of the entire country and may lead to biased results.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focused sample of households in rural western uganda may not be representative of the population of uganda and may lead to biased results.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on google’s community mobility report for severity of lockdown may not account for demographic or socioeconomic differences within the countries.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid urbanisation and globalisation leading to increased physical and mental health issues","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic and its impact on public health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of green space leading to increased lifestyle diseases like type-ii diabetes and heart diseases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to services and facilities due to lockdown measures","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"}]}
